reviewText: I give it three stars based on value.  You get a lot of film however if you are hoping somehow the quality hasn't been compromised you will be disappointed.  You may spend 73 straining to hear the dialogue.  The seller also requires a signature upon delivery which they do not tell you and seems ridiculous since the delivery window is about three weeks with no tracki

I ordered this a month before Christmas for my sword-fight loving 85 year old father. It still hasn't arrived.  Delay, delay and now I see it again - I REALLY DON'T THINK IT EXISTS !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
 The ONE STAR was for keeping my hope alive
